title: President debuts 'Happy Trump' lapel pin
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he’s never happy, never satisfied, but he debuted a “Happy Trump” pin to wear on his lapel during a White House meeting.

title: Dem AGs sue Trump's HHS over tens of billions in childcare funds
shortDescription: Top prosecutors are fighting in federal court to return billions in funds for childcare and family assistance, mostly for lower-income Americans.

title: Will Venezuelan opposition leader give Trump her Nobel Prize? Maybe.
shortDescription: President Trump said he will discuss prospect of Venezuela's opposition leader, María Corina Machado, giving him her Nobel Peace Prize when they meet.

title: 'Happy Trump' pin makes debut at White House discussion of Venezuela
shortDescription: Trump unveiled a 'Happy Trump' lapel pin at at White House discussion of rebuilding Venezuela and possibly taking control of Greenland.

title: Trump takes cautious approach amid mass Iran protests
shortDescription: President Trump has warned Iranian leaders that there will be "hell to pay" if they crack down on the protest movement.

title: Trump says US will take Greenland, potentially 'the hard way'
shortDescription: "If we don't do it the easy way, we're going to do it the hard way," Trump said about taking over Greenland, a territory of Denmark.

title: Trump says US will 'do something' on Greenland
shortDescription: President Trump said in a meeting with oil executives at the White House that the U.S. is "going to do something" on Greenland.

title: Trump marvels at White House ballroom construction: 'Wow, what a view'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump marveled at the ongoing White House construction ahead of a meeting with oil executives.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? See polls on Venezuela, Epstein
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has not shied away from controversy in a busy start to 2026. What is his approval rating as midterm elections approach?

title: Trump says US may start ‘hitting’ Mexican cartels
shortDescription: President Trump signals US could start ‘hitting’ drug cartels by land in Mexico.

title: Trump's attempt to rewrite history has been unsuccessful so far
shortDescription: In an attempt to rewrite history, Trump published a new webpage about the January 6th insurrection calling the rioters “unfairly targeted.”

title: Jesse Ventura hints at another run for governor, calls Trump 'coward'
shortDescription: In the wake of the Minneapolis shooting, former Minnesota Gov. Jesse Ventura slammed President Trump and hinted at another run for office.

title: Trump to meet with Machado next week
shortDescription: This would be President Donald Trump's first meeting with Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado.

title: Trump signals US to start ‘hitting’ drug cartels by land in Mexico
shortDescription: President Trump said the US will begin targeting drug cartels with military strikes, and suggested the operations could take place in Mexico.

title: 'We need Greenland for national security.' Why Trump wants the icy island
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has repeatedly talked about taking Greenland, a self-governing territory of Denmark. Why does he want the icy island so badly?

title: Jesse Ventura calls out Trump after ICE shooting
shortDescription: Jesse Ventura called President Trump a "draft-dodging coward," hinted at another run for mayor, and called out lawmakers after ICE shooting.

title: Trump meets with oil execs after Venezuela attack. Here's why.
shortDescription: Trump is encouraging U.S. oil executives to invest $100 billion in Venezuela to help rebuild that country after removing its leader, Nicolas Maduro.
